title: Assessment of toxic effects of thallium on the earthworm Eisenia fetida using the biomarker response index
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00253A, Paper
Shuai Li, Zhifeng Wang, Nan Gao, Xiaoyu Niu, Benteng Zhu, Lusheng Xu, Weina Xue
The Biomarker Response Index (BRI) was used to assess the comprehensive toxicity of thallium to earthworm Eisenia fetida.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
